thread.title: Jerusalem celebrates cultural tourismTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Jerusalem celebrates cultural tourismTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Jerusalem celebrates cultural tourism Published on : Thursday, October 8, 2015
The city’s development authority will join other exhibitors on the Israel Government Tourism Office stand at World Travel Market London 2015 to share details of its flourishing year-round events calendar.
Events include the Open House Festival – which enables visitors to see inside architecturally significant buildings – and the Light Festival, which sees old parts of the city dramatically lit up at night.
The city’s Sacred Music Festival brings visitors and performers from across the world, while the annual Jerusalem Marathon attracts about 25,000 runners.
